text: vipacariyum, vipacaranum iv viruvaril ovvoruvaraiyum nuru kacaiyati atiyunkal; meyyakave, ninkal allahvin mitum, iruti nal mitum iman kontavarkalaka iruntal. Allahvin cattat(tai niraiverruva)til, avviruvar mitum unkalukku irakkam erpata ventam; innum avviruvarin vetanaiyaiyum muhminkalil oru kuttattar (neril) parkkattum
